aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a tag's key and value in a request

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by the presence of tag key-value pairs in the request

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the tag keys in a request

geo:DeviceIds.description: Filters access by the presence of device ids in the request

geo:GeofenceIds.description: Filters access by the presence of geofence ids in the request
